mySelf.name: Yuzen
mySelf.description: Hi, I'm Small Z (18y)! Now studying in the five-year program at National Taichung University of Science and Technology (NUTC).
mySelf.content: I'm a third-year Information Management student at NUTC. I love programming and web design. I enjoy working on my own projects and working with others, as this helps me to learn and grow. I specialize in backend development, and I have experience with databases ER-model design and backend RESTful APIs. In the past, I thought that getting good results was the most important thing. But now I know that planning and preparation are also very important for a software engineer.
